plot outline: Sweety Satarkar, a fun-loving, carefree girl, falls in love with her friend's elder brother Shekhar. But Shekhar treats her like his younger sister. To get Shekhar's love and attention Sweety does everything in her control, but his marriage gets fixed with his childhood friend and Sweety's dream is shattered. Will her efforts succeed? Will Shekhar understand her love?
title: Sweety Satarkar
plot: A loud and daring woman falls in love with a bold man and attempts to win his heart by trying everything in the book to attract him.

_Sweety Satarkar_ (qv), a fun-loving, carefree girl, falls in love with her friend's elder brother Shekhar. But Shekhar treats her like his younger sister. To get Shekhar's love and attention Sweety does everything in her control, but his marriage gets fixed with his childhood friend and Sweety's dream is shattered. Will her efforts succeed? Will Shekhar understand her love?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni

Sweety a carefree girl has daily tussle with boys in her campus she is short tempered but has fun loving friendship with everyone. Sweety falls in love with Shekar whose the brother of he best friend and tries to impress in all possible ways like cooking and dressing according to his likes.But Shekar inst interested in her.To her surprise Shekar decides to marry his childhood friend.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
